Detailed Description

template<class CollectionContent>
struct eternity::sequence< CollectionContent >

Manage persistence of sequence containers (e.g. vector, list). Use template parameter to specify contents type (e.g. primitives, objects or pointers). This struct is not intended to direct use but must be passed as template parameter of xml_serialize() or serialize() algorithms.
